text:
I find then a law, that, 
when I would do good, 
evil is present with me.
-Romans 7:21 KJV

The LORD openeth the eyes
of the blind: the LORD raiseth them
that are bowed down: 
the LORD loveth the righteous:
-Psalm 146 KJV

And as it was in the days of Noe,
so shall it be also in the days
of the Son of man.
-Luke 17 KJV

He took not away
the pillar of the cloud by day,
nor the pillar of fire by night, 
from before the people.
-Exodus 13 KJV

Awake to righteousness, and sin not;
-1 Corinthians 15 KJV

And the great dragon was cast out,
that old serpent, 
called the Devil, and Satan, 
which deceiveth the whole world:
-Revelation 12 KJV

But thou, O man of God,
flee these things;
and follow after righteousness,
godliness, faith, love, 
patience, meekness.
-1 Timothy 6:11 KJV

He restoreth my soul:
he leadeth me in the paths
of righteousness for his name's sake.
-Psalm 23 KJV

Then shalt thou understand righteousness,
and judgment, and equity; 
yea, every good path.
-Proverbs 2 KJV

My tongue shall speak of thy word:
for all thy commandments 
are righteousness. 
-Psalm 119 KJV

Jesus answering said unto him, 
Suffer it to be so now: 
for thus it becometh us 
to fulfil all righteousness.
-Matthew 3 KJV

Quicken me, O LORD,
for thy name's sake: 
for thy righteousness' sake 
bring my soul out of trouble.
-Psalm 143:11 KJV

When the people 
are gathered together, 
& the kingdoms, to serve the LORD.
-Psalm 102 KJV

But who may abide
the day of his coming?
& who shall stand when he appeareth?
for he is like a refiner's fire,
and like fullers' soap:

And the whole earth 
was of one language, 
and of one speech. 
-Genesis 11:1 KJV

And when her days 
to be delivered were fulfilled, 
behold, there were twins in her womb.
-Genesis 25 KJV

In the beginning God created
the heaven and the earth.
-Genesis 1:1 KJV

And others save with fear, 
pulling them out of the fire; 
hating even the garment 
spotted by the flesh.
-Jude 1:23 KJV

I am he that liveth, and was dead;
and, behold, I am alive for evermore,
Amen; and have the keys 
of hell and of death.
-Revelation 1:18 KJV

And I looked, and behold a pale horse:
and his name that 
sat on him was Death, 
and Hell followed with him.

And when he had opened 
the fourth seal, I heard the voice
of the fourth beast say, 
Come and see.
-Revelation 6 KJV

Saying, Hurt not the earth
neither the sea, nor the trees,
till we have sealed the servants
of our God in their foreheads.
-Revelation 7 KJV

Lo, I see 4 men loose,
walking in the midst of the fire,
& they have no hurt;
& the form of the fourth
is like the Son of God.
-Daniel 3 KJV

The voice of the LORD
divideth the flames of fire.
-Psalm 29 KJV

Then the LORD rained upon
Sodom & upon Gomorrah brimstone
& fire from the LORD out of heaven;
-Genesis 19 KJV

He giveth snow like wool: 
he scattereth the hoarfrost like ashes. 
-Book 0f Psalm 147:16 KJV

To him give all the prophets witness,
that through his name 
whosoever believeth in him 
shall receive remission of sins.
-Acts 10 KJV

That word, I say, ye know, 
which was published 
throughout all Judaea, 
and began from Galilee,
after the baptism which John preached;

The word which God sent 
unto the children of Israel, 
preaching peace by Jesus Christ:
(he is Lord of all:)

But in every nation
he that feareth him, 
and worketh righteousness,
is accepted with him.
-Acts 10 KJV

And many of the children of Israel 
shall he turn to the Lord their God. 
-Luke 1:16 KJV

And Jesus answered him, 
The first of all the commandments is,
Hear, O Israel; 
The Lord our God is one Lord: 
-Mark 12 KJV

But to Israel he saith, 
All day long I have stretched 
forth my hands unto 
a disobedient & gainsaying people.
-Romans 10 KJV

And he stood before the altar
of the LORD in the presence
of all the congregation of Israel
& spread forth his hands:
-2 Chronicles 6:12 KJV

And in it have I put the ark, 
wherein is the covenant of the LORD, 
that he made with the children of Israel.
-2 Chronicles 6:11 KJV

And he erected there an altar, 
and called it Elelohe-Israel. 
-Genesis 33 KJV

God really does Love Us
til the end of the world & beyond

My soul longeth, yea, 
even fainteth for the courts of the LORD: 
my heart and my flesh 
crieth out for the living God. 
-Psalm 84 KJV

Let every thing 
that hath breath praise the LORD.
Praise ye the LORD.
-Psalm 150 KJV

5 Praise him upon the loud cymbals:
praise him upon 
the high sounding cymbals.

4 Praise him with the timbrel & dance:
praise him with stringed instruments
and organs.

3 Praise him with the sound 
of the trumpet: 
praise him with 
the psaltery and harp.

2 Praise him for his mighty acts:
praise him according 
to his excellent greatness.

1 Praise ye the LORD. 
Praise God in his sanctuary: 
praise him in the firmament 
of his power.
-Psalm 150 KJV

And when he was at the place,
he said unto them, 
Pray that ye enter not into temptation.
-Luke 22 KJV

Peace I leave with you, 
my peace I give unto you: 
not as the world giveth, 
give I unto you. 
Let not your heart be troubled,
-John 14 KJV

Great peace have they which love thy law:
-Psalm 119 KJV

For to be carnally minded is death;
but to be spiritually minded 
is life and peace. 
-Romans 8 KJV

That the righteousness of the law
might be fulfilled in us, 
who walk not after the flesh, 
but after the Spirit. 
-Romans 8 KJV

Blessed are the pure in heart: 
for they shall see God. 
-Book 0f Matthew 5 KJV

I have inclined mine heart 
to perform thy statutes alway, 
even unto the end. 
-Psalm 119 KJV

And put no difference 
between us and them, 
purifying their hearts by faith. 
-Acts 15 KJV

And my spirit 
hath rejoiced in God my Saviour.
-Luke 1 KJV

Beloved, let us love one another: 
for love is of God; 
and every one that loveth 
is born of God, and knoweth God. 
-1 John 4 KJV

So God created man in his own image,
in the image of God created he him; 
male and female created he them. 
-Genesis 1 KJV

And though after my skin 
worms destroy this body, 
yet in my flesh shall I see God: 
-Job 19 KJV

And Jesus said unto him, 
Verily I say unto thee, 
To day shalt thou 
be with me in paradise. 
-Luke 23 KJV

To him that overcometh
will I give to eat of the tree of life,
which is in the midst 
of the paradise of God. 
-Revelation 2 KJV

While it is said, 
To day if ye will hear his voice, 
harden not your hearts, 
as in the provocation. 
-Hebrews 3 KJV

And Pharaoh hardened his heart 
at this time also, 
neither would he let the people go. 
-Exodus 8 KJV

Light is sown for the righteous, 
and gladness for the upright in heart.
-Psalm 97:11 KJV

9 When your fathers tempted me,
proved me, and saw my work.
-Psalm 95 KJV

8 Harden not your heart, 
as in the provocation, 
and as in the day of temptation 
in the wilderness:

7 For he is our God; 
& we are the people of his pasture,
& the sheep of his hand. 
To day if ye will hear his voice,

5 The sea is his, and he made it: 
and his hands formed the dry land.

4 In his hand 
are the deep places of the earth: 
the strength of the hills is his also.

3 For the LORD is a great God, 
and a great King above all gods.

Let us come before his presence 
with thanksgiving, 
and make a joyful noise 
unto him with psalms.
-Psalm 95 KJV

And God called the light Day,
& the darkness he called Night.
And the evening & the morning 
were the first day. 
-Genesis 1 KJV

So shall they be life unto thy soul,
and grace to thy neck. 
-Proverbs 3:22 KJV

But grow in grace, 
and in the knowledge 
of our Lord & Saviour Jesus Christ.
To him be glory 
both now & for ever. Amen.

Then shall the dust 
return to the earth as it was: 
and the spirit shall return 
unto God who gave it. 
-Ecclesiastes 12 KJV

That which is born 
of the flesh is flesh; 
and that which is born 
of the Spirit is spirit. 
-John 3 KJV

38 Watch ye and pray,
lest ye enter into temptation.
The spirit truly is ready,
but the flesh is weak.

And he said, 
He that shewed mercy on him.
Then said Jesus unto him, Go,
and do thou likewise.
-Luke 10 KJV

To the Lord our God belong
mercies and forgivenesses,
though we have rebelled against him;
-Daniel 9 KJV

To deliver such an one unto Satan
for the destruction of the flesh, 
that the spirit may be saved
in the day of the Lord Jesus.
-1 Cor 5 KJV

From that time 
Jesus began to preach, 
and to say, Repent: 
for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.
-Matthew 4 KJV

1 these things write I unto you, 
that ye sin not. 
And if any man sin, 
we have an advocate with the Father, 
Jesus Christ the righteous:

Hatred stirreth up strifes: 
but Love covereth all sins. 
-Proverbs 10 KJV

Help us, O God of our salvation, 
for the glory of thy name: 
and deliver us, 
and purge away our sins, 
for thy name's sake. 
-Psalm 79 KJV

Look upon 
mine affliction and my pain; 
and forgive all my sins. 
-Psalm 25 KJV

If we confess our sins, 
he is faithful and just 
to forgive us our sins, 
and to cleanse us 
from all unrighteousness. 
-1 John 1:9 KJV

And their sins and iniquities 
will I remember no more. 
-Hebrews 10 KJV

Wherefore I abhor myself, 
and repent in dust and ashes. 
-Job 42 KJV

O God, 
thou knowest my foolishness; 
and my sins are not hid from thee.
-Psalm 69 KJV

Hide thy face from my sins, 
and blot out all mine iniquities. 
-Psalm 51 KJV

It is of the LORD'S mercies 
that we are not consumed, 
because his compassions fail not.
-Lamentations 3:22 KJV

And Jesus, 
moved with compassion, 
put forth his hand, and touched him, 
and saith unto him, I will; 
be thou clean. 
-Mark 1 KJV

Let not mercy & truth forsake thee:
bind them about thy neck; 
write them upon 
the table of thine heart: 
-Proverbs 3:3 KJV

And we have seen 
and do testify
that the Father sent the Son
to be the Saviour of the world. 
-1 John 4 KJV

13 Marvel not, my brethren,
if the world hate you.

Ye are of God, little children, 
and have overcome them: 
because greater is he that is in you,
than he that is in the world.

Ye are the light of the world.
-Matthew 5 KJV

And he said unto them, 
Go ye into all the world, 
and preach the gospel 
to every creature. 
-Mark 16 KJV

And when he is come, 
he will reprove the world of sin, 
and of righteousness, and of judgment:
-John 16 KJV

Before the LORD: for he cometh,
for he cometh to judge the earth: 
he shall judge the world w/ righteousness,
& the people with his truth.

15 Love not the world, 
neither the things 
that are in the world.

Where is the wise? 
where is the scribe? 
where is the disputer of this world?
hath not God made foolish
the wisdom of this world?

Say ye of him,
whom the Father hath sanctified,
and sent into the world,
Thou blasphemest; because I said,
I am the Son of God?
-John 10 KJV

Jesus answered them, 
Is it not written in your law, 
I said, Ye are gods?

For these things were done,
that the scripture should be fulfilled,
A bone of him shall not be broken.
-John 19 KJV

And when he had given thanks,
he brake it, and said, Take, eat:
this is my body, 
which is broken for you:

For we are members of his body,
of his flesh, and of his bones.
-Ephesians 5 KJV

The LORD redeemeth 
the soul of his servants: 
& none of them that trust in him
shall be desolate.
-Psalm 34 KJV

He keepeth all his bones: 
not one of them is broken.
-Psalm 34 KJV

O fear the LORD, ye his saints:
for there is no want 
to them that fear him.
-Psalm 34 KJV

Let thy mercy, 
O LORD, be upon us, 
according as we hope in thee.

To deliver their soul from death, 
and to keep them alive in famine.
-Psalm 33 KJV

Behold, the eye of the LORD
is upon them that fear him, 
upon them that hope in his mercy;
-Psalm 33 KJV

We Love Him, 
because He first loved us. 
-1 John 4:19 KJV

I know all the fowls of the mountains: 
& the wild beasts of the field are mine.
-Psalm 50:11 KJV

Gather my saints together unto me; 
those that have made 
a covenant with me by sacrifice.
-Psalm 50 KJV

And the name of the star
is called Wormwood: 
and the third part of the waters
became wormwood;
-Revelation 8:11 KJV

And for the wood offering, 
at times appointed, 
and for the firstfruits. 
Remember me, O my God, for good.
-Nehemiah 13 KJV

And being found in fashion as a man,
he humbled himself,
and became obedient unto death,
even the death of the cross.
-Philippians 2:8 KJV

He could save the whole worLd
but was not allowed to save His own self
truth is I don't think He ever wanted too
He just loved us that much

The truth can be bitter
can make your tummy hurt
as it goes down
Forgiveness is sweet
it is pure Joy
Thanking the Father
for sending His Son

Then said Jesus unto him, 
Except ye see signs & wonders, 
ye will not believe.
-John 4 KJV

Rejoice not against me, 
O mine enemy: 
when I fall, I shall arise; 
when I sit in darkness,
the LORD shall be a light unto me.
-Micah 7 KJV
Book 0f Mark 2 KJV

But the days will come, 
when the bridegroom shall 
be taken away from them, 
& then shall they fast in those days.

Can the children of the bridechamber fast,
while the bridegroom is with them?
as long as they have
the bridegroom w/ them,
they cannot fast.
Book 0f Revelation 3:3 KJV

Fasting
keeps the poisons & demons away
the devil wants to defile your temple 
for the wages of Sin is death
spiritually speaking
Stay Alive

A storm is coming
when the lights go out
He is with you stay strong
be not afraid
for You are the light
shine like the city on the hill

Prayer is a powerful weapon
against this world/enemy
he dont want us 2 pray 2 God
leave the world & stay in tune
He waiting 2hear from you
